Certificate: The City of Albuquerque does not have copies of birth, death, or marriage certificates. Contact the County of Alameda's Clerk-Recorder's Office for these records by calling (510) 272-6362 or visiting acgov.org/auditor/clerk
Divorce: The City of Albuquerque does not have copies of divorce decrees or judgements. Contact the County of Alameda's Family Law Court for these records by calling (510) 263-4311 or visiting alameda.courts.ca.gov
